professionalResumeDescription: I am a developer with over 3 years of experience in web and mobile applications, covering both frontend and backend development. My expertise spans technologies such as React, Angular, PrimeFaces, Spring Boot, Java, and Flutter. Additionally, I have experience in managing MySQL and PostgreSQL databases, as well as using version control with GitHub. I am always eager to learn new technologies and am passionate about delivering innovative technical solutions to challenging projects.
ud: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas.
updateData: Data update, to find new clients, gain in-depth insights into tastes and preferences, and identify promising prospects.
createMicrosites: Creation of microsites, to expand product or service information.
ftpManagement: FTP server management, for efficient file transfer to and from the server, creating directories, and uploading microsites.
receiveDocumentation: Reception of documentation, analysis, and efficient response for credit processes.
systemAccess: Handling applications to access the credit information system.
digitizeDocumentation: Digitize received documentation to proceed with the disbursement process.
mobileAppDevelopment1: Development of mobile applications with Flutter for the municipality of Sopó.
mobileAppDevelopment2: Development of a mobile application in Flutter for truck tracking and ticket management for Transpremier LLC.
adminSuiteDevelopment: Development of an administrative suite created in Angular and Spring Boot for the municipality of Sopó.
wildflyServerManagement: Management of Wildfly servers for application deployment.
webAndMobileAppDevelopment: Development of a web and mobile application for housing subsidy management for the municipality of Sopó using React and Flutter.
officialCommunicationsSystem: Development of the SICO (Sistema Integrado de Comunicaciones Oficiale in spanish) web application for the Regional Autonomous Corporation of La Guajira in Java and PrimeFaces.
thesisSubtitle: Thesis to qualify for the degree of Telecommunications Engineer
thesisDescription:
Implementation of a deployment management platform for web applications on EC2 virtual instances in AWS and VMs in Azure.
 This project was developed in React using PrimeReact and is hosted on Firebase Hosting.
thesisDescription2: I would like to emphasize that this project was awarded with an meritorious mention.
pokeDescription: PokeAPIProject is a demonstrative project. In this project, PokeAPI is used to allow users to explore detailed information about different Pokémon. This project was developed in Angular using PrimeNG and is hosted on Firebase Hosting.
fonotecaDescription: The sound library is a project developed in collaboration with the National Pedagogical University, within the framework of research-creation DSI 592-22. The Sound Library of Rural Childhoods contains the sonic heritage, historical, collective, and cultural memory of the knowledge that circulates in the parenting practices of girls and boys in rural contexts. This project was developed in WordPress.
intro1: Here you will find a glimpse into my academic life, my professional journey, and some projects that I love to undertake in my free time.
intro2: Explore and discover the different facets that make up my story; I hope you find something that inspires you!
